import React, { Component } from 'react'; import googleLogo from "../assets/icon/google-logo.png" import facebookLogo from "../assets/icon/facebook-logo.png" import twitterLogo from "../assets/icon/twitter-logo.png" import { getAuth, createUserWithEmailAndPassword } from "firebase/auth"; class Signup extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {color: "red"}; this.inputs = React.createRef([]); this.addInputs = (el) => { if (el && !this.inputs.current.includes(el)) { console.log(this.inputs) //this.inputs.current.push(el); } }; this.formRef = React.createRef(); this.signUp = (e, email, password) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.inputs); const auth = getAuth(); createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password) .then((userCredential) => { // Signed in const user = userCredential.user; // ... }) .catch((error) => { const errorCode = error.code; const errorMessage = error.message; // .. }); } } render() { return (
